ASharp.NAME: A Sharp
ASharp.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

CMajor.NAME: C Major
CMajor.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! card.
CMajor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! card.

Jam.NAME: Jam
Jam.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Harmony.

CMinor.NAME: C Minor
CMinor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Apply 1 Sadness. NL Gain [R].

TripleTime.NAME: Triple Time
TripleTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain [R].

SteelScale.NAME: Steel Scale
SteelScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scale: Gain !M! Block.

ShowMustGoOn.NAME: The Show Must Go On
ShowMustGoOn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy.
ShowMustGoOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy. NL The attacking enemy gains 1 Sadness.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Sad, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
